name: Harvester's Dance
description:
"Best Game Concept" - Make A Thing, Sept 2018

Catch  the green circles with the centre of the player ship.

Don't touch the green circles with the edges of the player ship.

Controls
Use WASD, or arrow keys (or a combination of the two), to move and rotate

Hold Space to resize

Esc to pause

Esc from pause to Quit to Menu

Esc from menu to Quit to Desktop

Credits:
player death sfx is "Laser Shot Silenced" by bubaproducer, Retrieved From: https://freesound.org/people/mtadder/sounds/99219/
